lead_paragraph: Speaking at MacDill Air Force Base, President Obama defended his approach to fighting wars while thwarting terrorist plots and protecting civil liberties.

byline.contributor: Gardiner Harris reported from Tampa, and Charlie Savage from Washington.
byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and CHARLIE SAVAGE

headline.print_headline: Obama, Defending Legacy, Warns Against ‘Elevating’ Terrorists
headline.main: Obama, in Major National Security Speech, Defends Counterterrorism Legacy

snippet: Speaking at MacDill Air Force Base, President Obama defended his approach to fighting wars while thwarting terrorist plots and protecting civil liberties....
